General.Name: Hitron Technologies Inc
General.Description: Hitron Technologies Inc., together with its subsidiaries, offers broadband access networking products and solutions in Taiwan. The company offers cable modems and gateways, wi-fi extenders, fiber ONT/ONUs, and 5G mobility solutions. It also provides coax and network testing tools, including wireless DOCSIS 3.1 meters; and MyMeter, a partner app that pairs with the hand-held CGN-DP3 DOCSIS 3.1 wireless meters. In addition, the company offers home network management solutions comprising HitronCloud, a cloud-based platform that provides real time visibility to the health of the IP network, HFC plant, in-home wiring, Wi-Fi, and health of the CPE hardware/firmware connected to the home network. Hitron Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1-8, Lihsin 1st Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
